content: Will ,@,narendramodi, do something to stop India's Cow Terrorists from Killing Muslims? In ,@,washingtonpost, I say: Quit using this repugnant euphemism called "vigilantism". These are Muslim hating mobs emboldened by powerful BJP leaders who defend them.,https://www.,washingtonpost.com/news/global-op,inions/wp/2018/07/24/will-modi-stop-indias-cow-terrorists-from-killing-muslims/, ,…
Did ,@,narendramodi, call them vigilantes? From what I remember, it came from your professional colleagues.
The two points are unlinked. If you read the piece I am happy to debate after
I did. Just uncomfortable with (a) false-equivalence (Cow's life > Indian Muslim); and the tweet obfuscating ,@,narendramodi, as somehow encouraging these mobs.
What about the BJP leaders including Ministers who defend the mobs

Then pls name them. Not their (a) boss (who has already condemned them), or (b) society large (for having accepted this behaviour). In a country as huge as India, you WILL have deviant behavior. Kind of pointless pointing to the top man for all ills of the country.
Named all of them. Why has no action been taken against them to set an example

Who says Action has NOT been taken ? People have been arrested & charge sheets filed immediately, UNLIKE lynching of 10000 Sikhs by Congress Leaders in 1984 , how many convicted ? why did u never ASK same questions to ur Congressi Paymasters? Clearly part of BIASED ,#,Presstitutes
Once u ask uncomforting question, she stops replying. Thats the biased mindset she has. Why doesnt she write an article about ousted Kashmiri pundits on ,@,washingtonpost, ???
See actual terrorism and have shame in defaming India alongwith the Hindus who are cow worshippers.Don't defend those who are playing foul with Hindu sentiments.,pic.twitter.com/dyQ8imKj3X
if your sentiments are hurt and in retaliation you go about killing people - they you are definitely are a terrorist  - that is how all terrorists justify their acts.
These are the people, who were preaching not to hurt lslamic sentiments after Charlie Hebdo massacre.

No Sir - you probably have things mixed up - these were the people who were also saying and correctly so that there was no justification at all for the attacks on Charlie Hebdo but it is you is saying that since your sentiments are hurt you can harm other people

Would you please clarify how many people claimed mob lynching when a dalit named Khetaram bheel was thrashed to death on the same day in Alwar?Why becoming selective on mob lynching?What about brutal killing of Chandan Gupta,Ankit Saxena,Dr Narang etc.?No outrage of Mob Lynching?

You should differentiate between "Sentiment of a person" and "Sentiment of a mass".Cow is treated motherly by the Hindus.Cow-slaughter is like "mother's slaughter".Why do they instigate and hurt deliberately the religious sentiments of the Hindus?

This may be your mindset that you call a Cow, simply an animal.This is not hindu mindset. Hindus call a Cow,Gomata, that means Mother Cow. Who are you to raise objection on Hindu Faith?First you learn to pay respect to all religions.That is road to real Hindutva.
